TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit SymmetricSecurityKey extends System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKey
Public MustInherit Class SymmetricSecurityKey Inherits SecurityKey

summary.span: 表示所有使用對稱演算法產生之金鑰的抽象基底類別。

span.span: Represents the abstract base class for all keys that are generated using symmetric algorithms.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常這個類別會被基礎結構用來轉換使用對稱金鑰的 XML。Typically, this class is used by the infrastructure to transform XML using a symmetric key.

MemberSignature.Value: protected SymmetricSecurityKey ();
.method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed
Protected Sub New ()
protected: SymmetricSecurityKey();

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract byte[] GenerateDerivedKey (string algorithm, byte[] label, byte[] nonce, int derivedKeyLength, int offset);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance unsigned int8[] GenerateDerivedKey(string algorithm, unsigned int8[] label, unsigned int8[] nonce, int32 derivedKeyLength, int32 offset) cil managed
Public MustOverride Function GenerateDerivedKey (algorithm As String, label As Byte(), nonce As Byte(), derivedKeyLength As Integer, offset As Integer) As Byte()
public: abstract cli::array <System::Byte> ^ GenerateDerivedKey(System::String ^ algorithm, cli::array <System::Byte> ^ label, cli::array <System::Byte> ^ nonce, int derivedKeyLength, int offset);
abstract member GenerateDerivedKey : string * byte[] * byte[] * int * int -> byte[]

param.name: algorithm
param.span: 表示用來產生衍生金鑰之密碼編譯演算法的 URI。

span.span: A URI that represents the cryptographic algorithm to use to generate the derived key.

param.name: label
param.span: 陣列，其中包含密碼編譯演算法的標籤參數。

span.span: An array of that contains the label parameter for the cryptographic algorithm.

param.name: nonce
param.span: 陣列，其中包含用來建立衍生金鑰的 Nonce。

span.span: An array of that contains the nonce that is used to create a derived key.
The size of the derived key.

param.name: offset
param.span: 衍生金鑰在這個方法所傳回之位元組陣列中的所在位置。

span.span: The position at which the derived key is located in the byte array that is returned from this method.

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，就會使用目前金鑰指定的密碼編譯演算法和參數來產生衍生金鑰。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, generates a derived key using the specified cryptographic algorithm and parameters for the current key.

returns.span: 陣列，其中包含衍生金鑰。

span.span: An array of that contains the derived key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 為了將 P-SHA1 指定成密碼編譯演算法，此時會使用 欄位。To specify P-SHA1 as the cryptographic algorithm, use the field.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract System.Security.Cryptography.ICryptoTransform GetDecryptionTransform (string algorithm, byte[] iv);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Security.Cryptography.ICryptoTransform GetDecryptionTransform(string algorithm, unsigned int8[] iv) cil managed
Public MustOverride Function GetDecryptionTransform (algorithm As String, iv As Byte()) As ICryptoTransform
public: abstract System::Security::Cryptography::ICryptoTransform ^ GetDecryptionTransform(System::String ^ algorithm, cli::array <System::Byte> ^ iv);
abstract member GetDecryptionTransform : string * byte[] -> System.Security.Cryptography.ICryptoTransform

param.name: algorithm
param.span: 解密加密文字 (例如加密的 XML) 的密碼編譯演算法。

span.span: A cryptographic algorithm that decrypts cipher text, such as encrypted XML.

param.name: iv
param.span: 陣列，其中包含指定之演算法的初始化向量 ()。

span.span: An array of that contains the initialization vector () for the specified algorithm.

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，取得會使用指定密碼編譯演算法來解密加密文字的轉換。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, gets a transform that decrypts cipher text using the specified cryptographic algorithm.
An that represents the decryption transform.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用表示在 類別中之解密演算法的欄位來指定此演算法。Use the fields that represent decryption algorithms in the class to specify the algorithm.

param.span: 加密 XML 的密碼編譯演算法。

span.span: A cryptographic algorithm that encrypts XML.

param.name: iv
param.span: 陣列，其中包含指定之演算法的初始化向量 ()。

span.span: An array of that contains the initialization vector () for the specified algorithm.

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，取得會使用指定密碼編譯演算法來加密 XML 的轉換。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, gets a transform that encrypts XML using the specified cryptographic algorithm.
An that represents the encryption transform.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用表示在 類別中之解密演算法的欄位來指定此演算法。Use the fields that represent decryption algorithms in the class to specify the algorithm.

abstract member GetIVSize : string -> int

param.name: algorithm
param.span: 要取得其初始化向量 () 大小的密碼編譯演算法。

span.span: The cryptographic algorithm to get the size of the initialization vector ().

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，取得指定之密碼編譯演算法所需的初始化向量 () 大小，以位元為單位。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, gets the size, in bits, of the initialization vector () that is required for the specified cryptographic algorithm.

returns.span: 指定於 參數中之密碼編譯演算法所需要的初始化向量 () 大小，以位元為單位。

span.span: The size, in bits, of the initialization vector () that is required for the cryptographic algorithm specified in the parameter.
